description: A React component implementing the main game logic and UI for a Tic Tac Toe game, including state management, move handling, and rendering of the game board and controls.

methods.name: Game
methods.description: Main functional React component managing the Tic Tac Toe game state and rendering the UI.

methods.name: handleClick
methods.description: Handles the user's move when a square is clicked, updates game state accordingly.

methods.name: handleRestart
methods.description: Resets the game to initial state.

methods.name: handleUndo
methods.description: Reverts to the previous game state if available.
